text: Pedro José Cevallos Salvador (1830–1892) was President of Ecuador from 1 July 1888 to 17 August 1888 and Vice President from 1886 to 1890. From April to August 1891 the presidency of Antonio Flores Jijón he was minister of Public Instruction, Interior Affairs and Foreign Affairs. Shortly before his death he became a member of the Ecuadoran Academy of Literature. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1830 births Category:1892 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Pedro José Cevallos
